function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and isolation measures","Impact":"Increased spread of infection and difficulty in containment","Mitigation":"Enforcement of quarantine rules, use of technology to monitor and track compliance","Technologies":"Mobile phone applications, GPS tracking, cloud technology","People":"Individuals in self-isolation, potentially exposed or infected people","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Inaccurate reporting of symptoms in self-reported surveys","Impact":"Mismanagement of asymptomatic cases and failure to identify potential spreaders","Mitigation":"Verification of self-reported data, combination with other screening and testing methods","Technologies":"QR code systems, mobile phone applications","People":"Individuals in self-isolation, symptomatic individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, government"}]}
